entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: NNE 25 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5 except plus 2 in low lying inland areas. Patchy frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5 except plus 2 in low lying inland areas. Patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
